sqlMap.select: select DOWN_ID, DOWN_DESC, DOWN_FILE_PATH, DOWN_PROGRESS, FILE_SIZE, FILE_ROWNUM, IS_DOWN, USER_ID, USER_NAME, to_char(START_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss') START_DATE, to_char(END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss') END_DATE from t01_sys_down_log where 1=1 and DOWN_DESC like '%'||#downDesc#||'%' order by DOWN_ID desc
select count(1) from t01_sys_down_log where 1=1 and DOWN_DESC like '%'||#downDesc#||'%'
